name: PARASHAR FOUNDATION
briefDescription: ORGAN (Organ Receiving & Giving Awareness Network) India, is an initiative of the Parashar Foundation, a Delhi based NGO, which was launched to address the dismal state of deceased organ donation in India.We seek to increase the number of donor pledges by creating widespread awareness on organ donation, and urge the government to develop a central organ sharing networkWe have come a long way and have many strategic partners with whom we have collaborated to make an impact.Created an ad-campaign (courtesy ad agency Wieden & Kennedy Delhi).ORGAN India Researched & released the first Report on Organ Donation in Delhi/NCR, to gain a complete understanding of the scenario & challenges faced.Produced a short film on Brain Death.
